resources.string:
(N)‏‮When‬‏ ‏‮you‬‏ ‏‮eject‬‏ ‏‮this‬‏ ^1, apps stored on it will stop working, and media files stored on it will not be available until it is reinserted.
‏‮This‬‏ ^1 ‏‮is‬‏ ‏‮formatted‬‏ ‏‮to‬‏ ‏‮work‬‏ ‏‮on‬‏ ‏‮this‬‏ ‏‮device‬‏ ‏‮only.‬‏ ‏‮It‬‏ ‏‮won’t‬‏ ‏‮work‬‏ ‏‮on‬‏ ‏‮any‬‏ ‏‮others.‬‏

(N){DEVICE_TYPE, select, PHONE {‏‮Can't‬‏ ‏‮connect.‬‏ ‏‮Check‬‏ ‏‮phone‬‏ ‏‮settings‬‏ ‏‮and‬‏ ‏‮try‬‏ ‏‮again.‬‏} TABLET {‏‮Can't‬‏ ‏‮connect.‬‏ ‏‮Check‬‏ ‏‮tablet‬‏ ‏‮settings‬‏ ‏‮and‬‏ ‏‮try‬‏ ‏‮again.‬‏} COMPUTER {‏‮Can't‬‏ ‏‮connect.‬‏ ‏‮Check‬‏ ‏‮computer‬‏ ‏‮settings‬‏ ‏‮and‬‏ ‏‮try‬‏ ‏‮again.‬‏} WATCH {‏‮Can't‬‏ ‏‮connect.‬‏ ‏‮Check‬‏ ‏‮watch‬‏ ‏‮settings‬‏ ‏‮and‬‏ ‏‮try‬‏ ‏‮again.‬‏} VEHICLE {‏‮Can't‬‏ ‏‮connect.‬‏ ‏‮Check‬‏ ‏‮vehicle‬‏ ‏‮settings‬‏ ‏‮and‬‏ ‏‮try‬‏ ‏‮again.‬‏} other {‏‮Can't‬‏ ‏‮connect.‬‏ ‏‮Check‬‏ ‏‮device‬‏ ‏‮settings‬‏ ‏‮and‬‏ ‏‮try‬‏ ‏‮again.‬‏} }

(N){DEVICE_TYPE, select, PHONE {‏‮{NETWORK_NAME}‬‏ ‏‮from‬‏ ‏‮your‬‏ ‏‮phone‬‏} TABLET {‏‮{NETWORK_NAME}‬‏ ‏‮from‬‏ ‏‮your‬‏ ‏‮tablet‬‏} COMPUTER {‏‮{NETWORK_NAME}‬‏ ‏‮from‬‏ ‏‮your‬‏ ‏‮computer‬‏} WATCH {‏‮{NETWORK_NAME}‬‏ ‏‮from‬‏ ‏‮your‬‏ ‏‮watch‬‏} VEHICLE {‏‮{NETWORK_NAME}‬‏ ‏‮from‬‏ ‏‮your‬‏ ‏‮vehicle‬‏} other {‏‮{NETWORK_NAME}‬‏ ‏‮from‬‏ ‏‮your‬‏ ‏‮device‬‏} }
